description:
In this course titled

Sleep deep solve problems fast results Hypnosis Hypnotherapy

All Files and videos are downloadable for easier access

You can learn how to change if you have difficulty sleeping with constant thoughts running through your mind or being disturbed by others snoring that stops you from having a restful nights sleep this is the course for you. Because with hypnosis you can program your mind to switch of outside disturbing noises in just the same way as when your are watching or listening to something very interesting nobody can get your attention.

With Hypnosis you can magnify anything you do naturally so will also be able to program your mind to come up with solutions as you sleep instead of leaving your mind to run on auto pilot and create random irrational dreams because it has no tasks to complete as you sleep.

I have also added a new way of dealing with someone who snores by creating a hypnosis session that will program your mind to ignore the sound of snoring just in the same way as you didn't hear someone trying to get your attention when you were absorbed in something of interest to you.

What I will teach you in this course

1. You will begin by creating an image in your mind of what you want so that you will know where you are going and how life will be after a perfect nights sleep.

2. Learn a secret feel good trigger that will help you through any bad times or set backs on your way.

3. Learn how your mind and body work together with some fun but important lessons that will improve the results of this hypnotherapy session.

4. Learn how you naturally resist changes even changes that can be very good for you

5. Learn just how powerful words can be and their effect on you physically even if they are only self talk.

6. Learn who can and cannot be hypnotized

7. Learn how you can feel amazing any time you want to

8. Sleep deep solve problems fast results Hypnosis Hypnotherapy bonus section

with extra hypnosis session

Ignore snoring Hypnosis session

How to use and apply EFT in the bonus section an amazingly powerful technique that can eliminate any limiting bad feelings that have been stopping you from feeling great

All Files and videos are downloadable for easier access
title: Sleep deep solve problems fast results Hypnosis Hypnotherapy
